item.title: Marvel Rivals Fans Want One Post-Match Feature Added to the Game
item.description:
Summary

  • A fan-made Marvel Rivals MVP Loki animation was shared on Reddit, and it enhances the character's troll factor in the game.
  • The end-of-match snippet shows Black Panther in his Galactic Claw skin emerging as the suspected MVP, but the crown is quickly taken away as Loki erases the character with his scepter.
  • Players hope Loki's MVP animation changes to the fan-made one in the future, or gets applied to Mysterio, should the character be added.

A Marvel Rivals player has shared a new MVP animation with the hero shooter’s community, turning the god Loki into an even bigger troll than he already is on the battlefield. During Marvel Rivals matches, whether they take place in Yggsgard, Tokyo 2099, or Klyntar, an MVP (Most Valuable Player) will be declared after battle, and it’s determined by each player’s overall stats, including the number of kill streaks.

Marvel Rivals launched in December 2024 and debuted as a free-to-play model with 33 characters available to play from day one, such as Wolverine, Doctor Strange, and Spider-Man. One leaked Marvel Rivals character could contest Jeff the Land Shark, the West Coast Avengers pet that has quickly become a fan-favorite thanks to its cute gameplay and often punishing combat, but Loki is also a popular choice to annihilate participants in style.

Posted on Reddit by Gloomy-Compote-231, a six-second animation was shared within the Marvel Rivals subreddit, showing a fan-made MVP animation for Loki. The end-of-match snippet featured Black Panther in his Galactic Claw skin emerging as the suspected MVP, but the crown is quickly taken away as Loki erases the character with his scepter. Loki is an exciting character to play in Marvel Rivals , and this animation adds to his deceptive qualities and general trolling in both the shooter and the greater Marvel Comics universe.

Marvel Rivals Players Want a Deceptive New MVP Animation for Loki

Marvel Rivals ’ Loki is inspired by the MCU’s variant from The Avengers , the 2012 live-action assembly of Marvel’s greats, and the shooter showcases his accurate level of mischievousness. The game’s community was on board with the new animation, wishing it would be added as a post-match feature. Redditors also thought it was a great idea to see the SVP (Second Valuable Player) announced before Loki interjects using a green smoke effect. If the MVP animation couldn’t be changed for Loki, then some players want to see this cut applied to Mysterio’s animation, if the character gets added to the roster down the line.

A Marvel Rivals leaker recently revealed a possible new skin for Loki, which could be added to the game very soon. The character’s new costume features a dark jade and black colorway with large horns on his armor resembling a dragon. A torn cape can also be spotted and the god’s dark hair appears to have turned white with his iconic staff taking the shape of a scythe. Currently, players are enjoying the recently added Moon Knight skins and the debut of Squirrel Girl, proving NetEase Games is hard at work supplying frequent fresh content with more to come.

item.title: Gimmiko - Announcement Trailer
item.description: Gimmiko is a dicebuilding twinstick action roguelite with a unique art style developed by SorryPoniko!. Watch the announcement trailer here.

item.title: What to Expect From World of Warcraft Classic in 2025
item.description:
While World of Warcraft Classic may have had a pretty big 2024 with three versions filled with content, Blizzard seems to be taking things even further in 2025. Not only can players expect to see more adventures within World of Warcraft Classic , but the Season of Discovery is also set to continue with its final content phase for now. If that was not enough, the newest version of WoW Classic will also be forging ahead, making for an extremely packed year of content for fans to enjoy.

Unlike World of Warcraft : The War Within , players should know almost everything they can expect throughout the year, as most of the content in World of Warcraft Classic has already been seen years prior. Thanks to Blizzard's roadmap, the direction this game is taking has been made even clearer. If the studio can deliver on all of it, fans should be in for a fantastic 2025.

World of Warcraft Classic Has Two Expansions of Content Coming

Cataclysm Classic is Coming to an End

At the start of 2025, players can expect to see their adventures in World of Warcraft Cataclysm Classic slowly conclude. At the end of 2024, they were treated to Phase 3, which brought the Firelands raid and everything associated with it. While no exact date has been revealed yet, fans should be getting Phase 4 sometime soon. It has been delayed from its original January 2025 release date, but it should not be long before players get their hands on it.

Phase 4 will introduce a slew of new dungeons, the Dragon Soul raid, and the finale of the Cataclysm story. After months of preparing, they will finally take on Deathwing and hopefully stop him from destroying Azeroth forever. With that, there will be countless new armor sets to collect, new quests to conquer, and all sorts of new activities to participate in. And once that goes live, all eyes will be on what comes next.

Mists of Pandaria Classic is Kicking Off Later this Year

Later this year, World of Warcraft Classic players will finally be venturing to the mysterious lands of Pandaria as Mists of Pandaria Classic is set to start rolling out in the summer. They will first be treated to the pre-patch introducing Theramore's Fall, the Pandaren playable race, the Monk class, and pet battles. In the fall, the expansion will officially launch and whisk players away on a wild adventure that will see them once again fight for the very fate of Pandaria and Azeroth. While the majority of that content will be released throughout 2026, the first chapter will round out 2025 in glorious fashion.

Classic 20th Anniversary Edition Content Will Roll Out Throughout the Year

All Phases of Classic Are on the Way

Launched at the end of last year, World of Warcraft Classic 20th Anniversary Edition is also set to receive a plethora of content throughout 2025. Right now, players are being treated to that classic 1-60 leveling adventure along with the Molten Core and Onyxia's Lair raids. On January 9th, they can expect a slew of content with the launch of Phase 2; Ruins of Dire Maul.

WoW Classic 20th Anniversary Edition Phase 2 will bring the updated honor system, Dire Maul, and world bosses Azuregos and Kazzak. Then, on January 16th, Warsong Gulch and Alterac Valley Battlegrounds will open their doors, giving players some high-stakes PvP action. After that, they can expect so much more content throughout the year.

Phase 3 is set to launch in the spring, bringing with it Blackwing Lair and the Darkmoon Faire. Phase 4 will then arrive in the summer and introduce the Zul'Gurub Raid and Arathi Basin battleground. Phase 5 will be released at the start of fall and add the Temple of Ahni'Qiraj and Ruins of Ahn'Qiraj Raid along with the AQ War Effort. The final phase will then launch at the end of fall, adding the Scourge Invasion, Naxxramas raid, and Silithus World PvP. With tons of content looming on the horizon, Classic fans will surely not get bored.

Burning Crusade Classic Launches Later This Year

If that was not enough, Blizzard also plans to launch World of Warcraft Burning Crusade Classic at the end of the year. Players will have to take up arms against the Burning Legion and Illidan Stormrage once more in the game's first-ever expansion pack. They will not only be treated to a whole new continent in the form of Outland but will also get to create their very own Blood Elf or Draenei. Along with that, the level cap will be increased to 70 and there will be countless new quests to complete and monsters to conquer.

This release will likely be the same core Burning Crusade Classic experience that launched in 2021. Those servers were replaced by Wrath of the Lich King in 2022, so it will be nice to see this expansion return. The roadmap suggests it could launch in either winter 2025 or spring 2026. But, as the phases of Classic come to a close, the studio will likely share more.

Season of Discovery Phase 7 Looms

Alongside those two versions of World of Warcraft Classic , Season of Discovery players will also be getting some new content to mess around with. Currently, players are embroiled in the Phase 6 content which introduced the AQ War Effort at the end of 2024. Sometime this winter, they will be treated to Phase 7. That update will add the Naxxramas raid and some new end-game content. Blizzard has yet to shed light on what that is or what comes after Phase 7, so players will have to wait and see.

This upcoming content makes for a pretty exciting year for World of Warcraft Classic players. As with retail WoW , there will surely be a few surprises waiting for players as the year progresses. Additionally, there will likely be new store mounts and Twitch drops for them to snag. Outside of that, there is no telling what else Azeroth has in store over these next 12 months.

item.title: Skip Bo Mobile Codes (January 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Skip Bo Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in Skip Bo Mobile

Skip Bo Mobile is an exciting card game with both campaign and multiplayer modes. Although the cards resemble UNO cards, the rules of the game are different, so the game is quite interesting and unique. As in almost any mobile game, Skip Bo has a currency for which you can buy a variety of items. Fortunately, there are many codes in the game that will give you a bunch of Coins.

Updated January 6, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: In this update, we found a lot of new codes that you can redeem to get in-game currency, or more precisely, coins. Save this guide because we often give new freebies.

How to Redeem Codes in Skip Bo Mobile

In mobile games, it is very important for players to be able to find where to redeem codes. Fortunately, in Skip Bo, redeeming codes is very simple, as you can see from these instructions:

  • Go to the Shop tab. This is the button in the lower right corner of the screen.
  • In the Shop, you will see offers to buy Coins and below them the Gift Code field. Click on it.
  • Enter or paste a code from our list of current codes.
  • Click Redeem to get your rewards.

Try to redeem all current codes as soon as possible because they expire very quickly, and you will not be able to receive rewards for them.

Skip Bo Mobile is available on iOS and Android.

item.title: Starseed Asnia Trigger Codes (January 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Starseed Asnia Trigger Codes
  • How to Redeem Starseed Asnia Trigger Codes
  • How to Get More Starseed Asnia Trigger Codes

Starseed Asnia Trigger is a Gacha RPG, so it has many different units, or more precisely, proxyans. Each of them has unique abilities, weapons, and stats. In addition, by correctly combining the characters' ultimates, you will deal tons of damage. But to get the best SSR proxyans, you will need a lot of Proxyan Tickets, which, fortunately, can be obtained using Starseed Asnia Trigger codes.

Each such code contains useful rewards, including valuable Starbits. However, their activity time is limited, so players should hurry to redeem them.

Updated January 6, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Many new codes have been added with this update. Make sure you redeem them now because they can expire at any time.

All Starseed Asnia Trigger Codes

Working Starseed Asnia Trigger Codes

  • HAPPYASNIA - Redeem this code to get 10 Luxurious Gifts. (NEW)
  • 2025TRIGGER - Redeem this code to get 5 Tactical Manuals. (NEW)
  • 2025ASNIA - Redeem this code to get 5 Credits. (NEW)
  • 2025SEED - Redeem this code to get 3 SR Proxyan Tickets. (NEW)
  • 2025SEED2 - Redeem this code to get 2 SR Proxyan Tickets. (NEW)
  • 2025STAR - Redeem this code to get 5 SR Proxyan Tickets. (NEW)

Expired Starseed Asnia Trigger Codes

  • GET5STARSEEDGIRLS - Redeem this code to get 5 Proxyan Tickets
  • STARSEEDFREEGIFT - Redeem this code to get 200 Starbits
  • SIAXFREYJA - Redeem this code to get 5 Pickup Proxyan Tickets
  • STARSEEDXSEFHI - Redeem this code to get 5 Proxyan Tickets

Starseed Asnia Trigger has a deep combat system where even the placement of characters can dramatically change the outcome of the battle. But as befits a Gacha game, getting even half of all the units is a difficult challenge. To summon, players need special items called Proxyan Tickets. They can be earned in Starseed Asnia Trigger during events, reaching milestones, and also with codes.

If you want to roll Gacha as much as possible from the very beginning of the game, then these codes are what you need. Most of them contain the Proxyan Ticket you need, as well as Starbits. Moreover, some codes contain Pickup Proxyan Tickets for event banners. But, after a certain time after the release, all codes expire, so you need to hurry to use them.

How to Redeem Starseed Asnia Trigger Codes

Luckily, using codes in Starseed Asnia Trigger is quite simple and not very different from other Gacha games. This can be done either in-game or by visiting the game's website.

How to Redeem Codes In-game

  • Launch Starseed Asnia Trigger .
  • Then, complete the tutorial if you haven't done so already.
  • After that, open the menu by tapping the button with three stripes in the upper right corner.
  • Next, go to Settings and select the Account tab.
  • Finally, click on the Redeem Coupon option, enter the code in the new window and press enter.

How to Redeem Codes on the Website

  • Visit the Starseed Asnia Trigger Coupon Exchange page.
  • Then, enter your Player CS Code which can be found in the same Account tab.
  • After that, enter the code and click Use Coupon to get the goodies.

If you do everything correctly, and the codes are still active, you will see a message about the successful use of codes. The rewards will come to your in-game mail within a couple of minutes.

How to Get More Starseed Asnia Trigger Codes

You should visit the official pages of the developers to avoid missing the latest codes for this free mobile game. There, you will find all the news about upcoming events, banners, and giveaways.

  • Starseed Asnia Trigger YouTube channel
  • Starseed Asnia Trigger X page
  • Starseed Asnia Trigger Discord server

Starseed Asnia Trigger is available on mobile devices.
